TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit EastAsianLunisolarCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar
Public MustInherit Class EastAsianLunisolarCalendar Inherits Calendar
public ref class EastAsianLunisolarCalendar abstract : System::Globalization::Calendar

summary.span: 表示曆法，這個曆法會將時間分割成月、日、年和紀元，並根據太陽和月亮的循環週期來產生日期。

span.span: Represents a calendar that divides time into months, days, years, and eras, and has dates that are based on cycles of the sun and the moon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別除了陽曆年和月農曆支援年六十年週期 （會重複每隔 60 年）。The class supports the sexagenary cycle of years (which repeats every 60 years) in addition to solar years and lunar months. 行事曆中的每一個陽曆年都與六十年的年度 (請參閱)，天文 Stem (請參閱)，和糔礜惎纕分支 (請參閱)。Each solar year in the calendar is associated with a Sexagenary Year (see ), a Celestial Stem (see ), and a Terrestrial Branch (see ). > [!NOTE] > 如需使用類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 年份可以有一年，任何月份為閏月和一個月可以有為閏日。A year can have a leap month after any month of the year, and a month can have a leap day. 例如，方法會傳回表示指定的日期與相關聯之月份的正整數。For example, the method returns a positive integer that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month. 每個支援一組的行事曆。Each supports a set of calendars. 目前，沒有任何衍生自陰陽曆類別任何支援的文化特性所使用的類別。Currently, none of the lunisolar calendar classes that derive from is used by any of the cultures supported by the class. 因此，這個類別和衍生自它可以用於只計算的東亞洲的陰陽曆。Therefore, this class and those that derive from it can be used only to calculate dates in the East Asian lunisolar calendars. 這個類別支援 「 取得 」 的數種方法，來描述中陰陽曆，使用的術語和方法將從要使用的陰陽曆資料轉換。This class supports several "get" methods to describe a in the terms used by lunisolar calendars, and the method to convert from lunisolar calendar data to a .

MemberSignature.Value: public override DateTime AddMonths (DateTime time, int months);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.DateTime AddMonths(valuetype System.DateTime time, int32 months) cil managed
Public Overrides Function AddMonths (time As DateTime, months As Integer) As DateTime
public: override DateTime AddMonths(DateTime time, int months);

param.name: time
param.span: 要在其中新增 months 的 。

span.span: The to which to add months.
The number of months to add.

summary.span: 計算與指定日期相差指定月數的日期。

span.span: Calculates the date that is the specified number of months away from the specified date.

returns.span: 新 ，將所指定月數加入至 參數所產生。

span.span: A new that results from adding the specified number of months to the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 在此情況下，日的部分會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。In this case, the day part is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分如果產生的月份超出指定的年份，會影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 10 月 31 天內，其指定一天是三十三優先該月份日期，以及值`months`參數為 6，產生的年份是其中一個多個指定的年份，產生的月份是一年 4 月，而產生的日期為第 30 天、 4 月的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the thirty-first day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the thirtieth day, which is the last day in April. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)]

exception.span: 結果不在 支援的範圍內。

span.span: The result is outside the supported range of a .
is less than -120000 or greater than 120000.
-or-
is less than or greater than .

param.span: 要在其中新增 years 的 。

The number of years to add.

summary.span: 計算與指定日期相差指定年份的日期。

span.span: Calculates the date that is the specified number of years away from the specified date.

returns.span: 新 ，將所指定年份加入至 參數所產生。

span.span: A new that results from adding the specified number of years to the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 在此情況下，日的部分會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。In this case, the day part is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，二月有 28 天，除了閏年時有 29 天期間。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是潤年 2 月版的二十第九個日期值`years`參數為 1，則產生的日期會是下列年 2 月版的二十二十二天。If the specified date is the twenty-ninth day of February in a leap year and the value of the `years` parameter is 1, the resulting date will be the twenty-eighth day of February in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)]

exception.span: 結果不在 支援的範圍內。

span.span: The result is outside the supported range of a .
is less than or greater than .

span.span: The to read.

summary.span: 計算指定日期中年份的日期。

span.span: Calculates the day of the year in the specified date.

returns.span: 1 到 354 的整數 (一般年份中)，或是 1 到 384 的整數 (閏年中)，表示 參數中所指定之年份的日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 through 354 in a common year, or 1 through 384 in a leap year, that represents the day of the year specified in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年份的日期被定義為一年的第一天中的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，和的上個月的最後一天傳回該年度的總天數，這相同的值由。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by .

summary.span: 計算指定年份和紀元的閏月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for the specified year and era.

returns.span: 1 到 13 的正整數，表示在指定的年份及紀元中的閏月。

span.span: A positive integer from 1 through 13 that indicates the leap month in the specified year and era.
-or-

returns.span: 如果這個曆法不支援閏月，或是 和 參數沒有指定閏年，便為零。

span.span: Zero if this calendar does not support a leap month, or if the and parameters do not specify a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援閏月行事曆，在特定月份或任何一年中月份之後發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法傳回的數字 1 到 13，表示相關聯的指定日期的月份。For example, the method returns a number from 1 through 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以將任何以現行曆法的日期轉換為西曆日期。The method can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 西曆日期之後可用，例如，比較在不同的行事曆中的日期，或建立特定的日曆中的相等的日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.

exception.span: 、、、、、、 或 在這個曆法所支援的範圍之外。

span.span: , , , , , , , or is outside the range supported by this calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);

param.name: year
param.span: 兩位數或四位數整數，代表要轉換的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 將指定的年份轉換成 4 位數年份。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year.

returns.span: 整數，包含 參數的四位數表示。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用屬性來判斷適當世紀。The method uses the property to determine the appropriate century. 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 將使這個方法將值轉換為四位數的值根據值，表示該適當世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍四位數值或它提供一個負數值，方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 在這個日曆所支援的範圍之外。

span.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許 2 位數的年份的 4 位數年份正確轉譯。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 比方說，在西曆中，如果這個屬性設定為 2029，100 年範圍是從 1930年到 2029年。For example, in the Gregorian calendar, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 這個屬性的起始值被衍生自 控制台 的地區及語言選項 部分中的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 不過，該資訊可以變更的生命期限內。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定中變更自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically.

span.span: The current is read-only.

exception.span: 設定作業中的值小於 99 或大於目前曆法中可支援的最大年份。

span.span: The value in a set operation is less than 99 or greater than the maximum supported year in the current calendar.
